name: Grand Stalingrad
description:
Simple but desperate rts set in Stalingrad. Directly inspired by lil Stalingrad <3 https://botzgames.itch.io/lilstalingrad

Controls (also in starting stage):

Left click: Select units

Right click: Move units

Middle click/esc: Deselect units (!)

Right click (selected and hovering over gun): pick up gun

Shoot Button/F: Shoot mode

Right click(shoot mode): fire

We have information you must get to the rest, by any means necessary. If need be, only one of us could make it back in the hellscape of Stalingrad
